results.title: Metformin treatment prevents gallstone formation but mimics porcelain gallbladder in C57Bl/6 mice.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment prevents @<m>DISEASE_Gallstones</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D042882 @@@gallstone formation@@@ but mimics porcelain @DISEASE_Gallbladder_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D005705 @@@gallbladder@@@ in @CELLLINE_CVCL:0192 @@@C57Bl/6@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

results.title: Association between clinical outcomes and metformin use in adults with sickle cell disease and diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: Main outcomes included annual rates of all-cause inpatient encounters, all-cause emergency department (ED) encounters, inpatient and ED encounters with @DISEASE_Anemia_Sickle_Cell @DISEASE_MESH:D000755 @@@SCD@@@ codes, @DISEASE_Arterial_Occlusive_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001157 @@@vaso-occlusive episodes@@@ (@DISEASE_Arterial_Occlusive_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001157 @@@VOEs@@@), @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@strokes@@@, @DISEASE_Acute_Chest_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D056586 @@@acute chest syndrome@@@ (@DISEASE_Acute_Chest_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D056586 @@@ACS@@@), @DISEASE_Osteonecrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010020 @@@avascular necrosis@@@ (@DISEASE_Osteonecrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010020 @@@AVN@@@), and @<m>DISEASE_Gallstones</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D042882 @@@gallstones@@@. Of 457 adults (median age [interquartile range], 43 years [33-52 years]; 72% female), 142 (31%) were treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.
